GV04sankharu:4: tasmād enat parasmai na śaṃsen net sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām ātmānaṃ parasmin dadhānīti ||
GV04sankharu:6: tasmād enat parasmai na śaṃsen ned indrasyātmānaṃ parasmin dadhānīti ||
GV04sankharu:7: atho yam evaitam ṛṅmayaṃ yajurmayaṃ sāmamayaṃ puruṣaṃ saṃskurvanti tasyaiṣa ātmā yan mahāvratam |
GV04sankharu:8: tasmād enat parasmai na śaṃsen net sarveṣāṃ chandasām ātmanaṃ parasmin dadhānīti ||
GV04sankharu:10: pitre vācāryāya vātmane haivāsya tacchandastaṃ bhavati |
GV04sankharu:15: atho caturviṃśo vai purastāt kṛto bhavati tasyaiṣa gatir yat pañcaviṃśaḥ |
GV04sankharu:20: atho etad eva paśuṣvaindraṃ rūpaṃ yad ṛṣabhaḥ ||
GV04sankharu:22: tasya viśoviśo vo atithim iti dvādaśarcam ājyam |
GV04sankharu:24: tasmin vai dve chandasī bhavato gāyatryaścānuṣṭubhaśca |
GV04sankharu:25: agniṃ naro dīdhitibhiraraṇyor ityetat pañcaviṃśatyṛcam upasaṃśaṃsati |
GV04sankharu:27: tad vai śastraṃ samṛddhaṃ yat stomena saṃpadyate |
GV04sankharu:28: tasmin vai dve chandasī bhavato virājaśca triṣṭubhaśca |
GV04sankharu:30: catuṣṭayaṃ vā idaṃ sarvam asyaiva sarvasyāptyai |
GV04sankharu:34: kuvid aṅga namasā ye vṛdhāsa ity vāyavyaṃ mahadvad vṛdhavat |
GV04sankharu:36: ata evottaraṃ tṛcam aindravāyavaṃ yāvattarastanvo yāvadoja iti yāvannaraścakṣasā dīdhyānā ityetena rūpeṇa |
GV04sankharu:37: ud vāṃ cakṣurvaruṇa supratīkam iti maitrāvaruṇaṃ devayoreti sūryastatanvān ityetena rūpeṇa |
GV04sankharu:38: ka u śravat katamo yajñiyānām ityāśvinaṃ yaṃ Suryasya duhitāvṛṇītetyetena rūpeṇa |
GV04sankharu:39: kathā mahām avṛdhat kasya hotur ityaindraṃ mahadvad vṛdhavat
GV04sankharu:41: ko vastrāta vasavaḥ kau varūteti vaiśvadevaṃ sahīyaso varuṇa mitra martād ityetena rūpeṇa |
GV04sankharu:42: uta syā naḥ sarasvatī juṣāṇeti sarasvataṃ dvārāvṛtasya subhago vyāvar ityetena rūpeṇa |
GV04sankharu:43: eṣa vā u kadvāṃstraiṣṭubhas tṛcakl̥pto vāmadevyaḥ praügaḥ |
GV04sankharu:44: prajāpatir vai vāmadevaḥ prajāpatāveva tat sarvān kāman ṛdhnuvanti |
GV04sankharu:45: tad āhur na traiṣṭubhaṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ syāt |
GV04sankharu:52: ā tvā rathaṃ yathotaya iti marutvatīyasya pratipat |
GV04sankharu:56: asat su me jaritaḥ sābhivega iti vāsukraṃ pūrvaṃ śastvā mahāṁ indro nṛvad ā carṣaṇiprā ityetasmiṃstraiṣṭubhe nividaṃ dadhāti |
GV04sankharu:59: atha yad mahāṁ indro nṛvad ā carṣaṇiprā iti mahadvat |
GV04sankharu:66: etābhir vai devāḥ sarvā aṣṭīr āśnuvata |
GV04sankharu:67: tatho evaitad yajamānā etābhir eva sarvā aṣṭīr aśnuvate |
GV04sankharu:73: āpo vā annasyāyataḥ pūrvā āyanti, āpaḥ parimādaḥ |
GV04sankharu:74: atha vai parimādo yan nakhāni dantās tanūr lomānīti |
GV04sankharu:78: bhūtacchandāṃ sāma priyam indrasya dhāmopajagāmeti; krośānukrośe,
GV04sankharu:83: teṣu yadā paryāyaṃ sāmagāḥ stuvate, atha hotāram āhur anujapeti |
GV04sankharu:85: caivaṃ stuvīran yadi ca stuvīran anveva japet ||
GV04sankharu:87: tāni vā etani sapta devacchandāṃsi bhavanti |
GV04sankharu:92: athātraiva tiṣṭhann agniṃ yathāṅgam upatiṣṭhate namo nama iti |
GV04sankharu:96: ākāśaṃ śālāyai kuryur iti haika āhuḥ |
GV04sankharu:97: deśena tvevopatiṣṭheta tirohito ha vā eṣa etasmin parama ukthe parama āśiṣo vadati - saṃ mahān mahatyādadhād iti |
GV04sankharu:98: agnir vai mahan iyaṃ pṛthivī mahatī |
GV04sankharu:109: viśvāmitro ha vā indrasya priyaṃ dhāmopajagāma śastreṇa ca vratacaryayā |
GV04sankharu:110: taṃ hendra uvāca viśvāmitra varaṃ vṛṇīṣveti |
GV04sankharu:111: sa hovāca viśvāmitras tvām eva vijānīyām iti |
GV04sankharu:116: taṃ hendra uvāca mahāṃśca mahatī cāsmi |
GV04sankharu:119: tata u ha viśvāmitro vijijñāsām eva cakre |
GV04sankharu:120: taṃ hendra uvācaitad vā aham asmi yad etad avocaṃ yad vā ṛṣe 'to bhūyo 'tapās tadeva tat syād yad aham iti |
GV04sankharu:121: tad vā indro vyāhṛtīr ūce tā upāptā āsann iti |
GV04sankharu:122: athopanidhāya preṅkhaphalakaṃ trir abhyanya trir abhyavān iti ||
GV04sankharu:126: athainad urasā saṃspṛśya dakṣiṇaṃ bhāgam ātmano 'tiharañ japati - arko 'si vasavastvā gāyatreṇa cchandasārohantu te ta āroḷhāra ityeva tad āha |
GV04sankharu:128: rājyaṃ ha vā idam u haiva cakṣate |
GV04sankharu:129: athottaraṃ bhāgam ātmano 'tiharañ japati - rudrāstvā traiṣṭubhena chandasārohantu te ta āroḷhāra ityeva tad āha |
GV04sankharu:131: svārājyaṃ ha vai rājyād adhitarām iva |
GV04sankharu:132: atha dakṣiṇaṃ bhāgam ātmano 'tiharañ japati - ādityāstvā jagatena cchandasārohantu te ta āroḷhāra ityeva tad āha |
GV04sankharu:134: sāmrājyaṃ ha vai svārājyād adhitarām iva |
GV04sankharu:135: athottaraṃ bhāgam ātmano 'tiharañ japati - viśve tvā devā ānuṣṭubhena chandasārohantu te ta āroḷhāra ityeva tad āha |
GV04sankharu:138: atha samadhisṛpya prāñcau pādā upāvahṛtya bhūmau pratiṣṭhāpayati |
GV04sankharu:139: udyatataro ha vā eṣo 'smāl lokād bhavati |
GV04sankharu:143: atha trit abhanya trir abhyavān iti |
GV04sankharu:144: athopari preṅkhaphalake dakṣiṇottariṇam upasthaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇena prādeśena paścāt prāṅ preṅkhaphalakam upaspṛśati |
GV04sankharu:145: prajāpatiṣ ṭvā rohatu vāyuḥ preṅkhayatv iti |
GV04sankharu:146: prajāpatir vā etad ārohati vāyuḥ preṅkhayati yaj jīvam |
GV04sankharu:147: atha trir abhanya trir abhavān iti |
GV04sankharu:152: saṃ cakṣur manasā sam ahaṃ manasā,
GV04sankharu:153: saṃ prajāpatiḥ paśubhiḥ sam ahaṃ paśubhir ityāśiṣam eva tad vadate |
GV04sankharu:156: premāṃ vācaṃ vadiṣyāmīti pravadiṣyan hyeṣa etāṃ vācaṃ vadati bahu kariṣyantīṃ bahu kariṣyann iti |
GV04sankharu:159: bahor bhūyaḥ kariṣyantīṃ bahor bhūyaḥ kariṣyann iti bahor bhūyo hyeṣā vāk kariṣyantī bhavati bahor bhūyo 'yaṃ ya etasyāhnaḥ śastraṃ prāpnoti |
GV04sankharu:160: svar gamiṣyantīṃ svar gamiṣyann iti svar hyeṣā vāg gamiṣyantī bhavati svar ayaṃ ya etasyāhnaḥ śastraṃ prāpnoti |
GV04sankharu:161: svar imān yajamānān vakṣyan ity eva brūyāt |
GV04sankharu:162: yaṃ dviṣyāt taṃ brūyān nā nāmuṃ nāmum iti |
GV04sankharu:163: sa yāvato ha vā eṣa etasmād devasthāt pratisaṃkhyāya nirdhūnute niṣ ṭad dhūnute |
GV04sankharu:167: vāyur vā eṣa prāṇo bhūtvaitad ukthaṃ śaṃsati |
GV04sankharu:170: gurau vā eṣa yukto bhavati ya etasyāhnaḥ śatraṃ prāpnoti,
GV04sankharu:171: tasya gurau yuktasyeśvaraḥ prāṇo yadi nāpaparājetoḥ |
GV04sankharu:174: na ha vā etasyai devatāyai digdhena nāsinā na paraśunā na kenacanāvatardo 'sti |
GV04sankharu:175: tad ya evaṃ vidvāṃsam apavadati sa eva pāpīyān bhavati |
GV04sankharu:182: prāṇo vai hiṃkāraḥ prāṇenaivaitad ukthaṃ pratipadyate |
GV04sankharu:183: atho ūrg vai raso hiṃkāra ūrjam eva tad rasam etasmin ukthe dadhāti / atho amṛtatvaṃ vai hiṃkāro 'mṛtatvam eva tad ātman dhatte |
GV04sankharu:185: etad vai pratyakṣaṃ sāma yad rājanam |
GV04sankharu:194: vāg vā etad ahar manas tūṣṇīṃśaṃsaḥ |
GV04sankharu:196: tad id āsa bhuvaneṣu jyeṣṭham iti stotriyastṛcaḥ |
GV04sankharu:197: vāvṛdhānaḥ śavasā bhūryojā iti vṛdhavan mahadvat |
GV04sankharu:201: ātmā vai pañcaviṃśaḥ prajā paśava upasargaḥ |
GV04sankharu:202: prajayaiva tat paśubhiḥ preṣyair annādyenetyātmānam upasṛjate |
GV04sankharu:203: nadaṃ va odatīnām iti traiṣṭubhāni pūrvāṇi padāni karoti nadasyottarāṇi |
GV04sankharu:204: prathamena traiṣṭubhena padena prathamaṃ nadasya padam uṣasamādhāyāvasyati |
GV04sankharu:208: evaṃ vihṛtāṃ prathamāṃ triḥ śaṃsati, parācīr uttarā evaṃ vihṛtā eva |
GV04sankharu:209: yā tṛtīyā sūktasya tasyā uttaram ardharcam utsṛjati nadasya cottaram |
GV04sankharu:210: so 'yaṃ mukhasya vivaras tena vācaṃ vadati mukhena vai vācaṃ vadati |
GV04sankharu:211: tau purastād dvipadānāṃ śaṃsati tathā hāsya stotriyānantarhitā bhavatyātmānaṃ śastvā |
GV04sankharu:213: atho āpo vai sūdadohā adbhir vā imāni parvāṇi saṃhitāni bhavanti |
GV04sankharu:214: atho amṛtatvaṃ vai sūdadohā amṛtatvaṃ eva tad ātman dhatte |
GV04sankharu:216: tad yathā ha vai dāruṇaḥ śleṣma saṃśleṣaṇaṃ syāt paricarmaṇyaṃ vaivam tṛcāśītir evasūdadohāḥ sarveṣāṃ vedānāṃ śaṃśleṣiṇī ||
GV04sankharu:220: trīṇi vā asya śīrṣṇaḥ kapālāni bhavanti |
GV04sankharu:222: tāni trīṇi punarevaikaṃ tredhā tredhā tā nava ṛco bhavanti |
GV04sankharu:229: trīṇi vā āsāṃ grīvāṇāṃ parvāṇi bhavanti |
GV04sankharu:237: ṛṣvā ta indra sthavirasya bāhū iti bāhvor abhirūpā |
GV04sankharu:247: sa eka id dhavyaś carṣaṇīnām iti sūktaṃ tat pacchaḥ |
GV04sankharu:248: tasya dvitīyām uddhṛtya viśvo hyanyo arirājagāmeti |
GV04sankharu:249: yaitasya dvitīyā tām iha dvitīyāṃ karoti |
GV04sankharu:254: trīṇi vā asya pāṇeḥ parvāṇi bhavanti |
GV04sankharu:257: tasmād ayam aṅguṣṭhaḥ sarvā aṅgulīḥ pratyeti |
GV04sankharu:261: tau vā etau pakṣau bārhatarāthantarau caturviṃśau |
GV04sankharu:269: sapta vai chandāṃsi sarveṣām eva chandasām āptyai |
GV04sankharu:274: stotriyān evaitābhir anuśaṃsati gāyatryā gāyatram auṣṇihyā ca bārhatyā ca bṛhadrathantare |
GV04sankharu:275: iyam eva dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvaṃ gāyatrī savyam auṣṇihī madhyaṃ bārhatī |
GV04sankharu:284: mahāṁ indro ya ojasetyetayā gāyatrīm aśītiṃ pratipadyate stomair vatsasya vāvṛdha iti mahadvatyā vṛdhavatyā |
GV04sankharu:288: yā indra bhuja ābhara ityetayā bārhatīm aśītiṃ pratipadyate stotāram in maghavann asya vardhayeti mahadvatyā vṛdhavatyā |
GV04sankharu:291: ayaṃ te astu haryata ā mandrair indra haribhiḥ sūkte |
GV04sankharu:292: tad yad ete antataḥ śaṃsati saṃsiddhābhir bṛhatībhir auṣṇihīm aśītiṃ samārohāṇīti ||
GV04sankharu:294: indraḥ suteṣu someṣv ityetayauṣṇihīm aśītiṃ pratipadyate vide vṛdhasya dakṣaso mahān hi ṣa iti vṛdhavatyā mahadvatyā |
GV04sankharu:297: tā vā etā aśītayaḥ saṃśastāḥ saptaviṃśatiśatānyṛcāṃ saṃpadyante |
GV04sankharu:298: sapta vai viṃśati śatāni saṃvatsarasyāhorātrāṇāṃ tad aśītibhiḥ saṃvatsarasyāhorātrāṇyāpnoti |
GV04sankharu:301: bārhatyā aśītyā aśītiṃ caturakṣarāṇyuddharati kākubhebhyaḥ pragāthebhyaś caturviṃśatiṃ caturakṣarāṇi tāni catuḥśataṃ caturakṣarāṇi catuḥśate gāyatrīṣūpadadhāti |
GV04sankharu:306: tad yad etad antataḥ śaṃsati saṃsiddhābhir uṣṇigbhir vaśaṃ samārohāṇīti ||
GV04sankharu:311: yad ataḥ kiṃca bahirdhā tata eva tac chrapayati yad antar udare |
GV04sankharu:312: tasmād bahvyo devatā bahūni cchandāṃsi vaśe śasyante |
GV04sankharu:313: tasmād idaṃ bahu viśvarūpam udare 'nnam avadhīyate |
GV04sankharu:319: athaitā dvipadāḥ śaṃsati | pratiṣṭhānīyaṃ vai chando dvipadāḥ pratiṣṭhityā eva ||
GV04sankharu:321: athaitad aindrāgnaṃ sūktaṃ gāyatrīśaṃsaṃ śaṃsati | pratiṣṭhe vā indrāgnī pratiṣṭhityā eva ||
GV04sankharu:328: vāg vā etad ahar vāg anuṣṭub vācyeva tad vācaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati |
GV04sankharu:330: sa pratnathā kavivṛdha iti tṛcam arkavat tena samṛddham |
GV04sankharu:336: +indrasyaivaitac chando yat triṣṭup tad enaṃ svena chandasā samardhayati |
GV04sankharu:337: hairaṇyastūpīyaṃ ca yātaūtīyaṃ ca bārhatarāthantare bṛhadrathantare hi purastāt kṛte bhavataḥ |
GV04sankharu:338: sajanīyaṃ cādhvaryavo bharatendrāya somam iti ca tāḥ saptaviṃśatir ṛco bhavanti |
GV04sankharu:347: tad yathā vraje paśūn avasṛjyārgaleṣīke parivyayet |
GV04sankharu:348: evam evaitaiḥ padānuṣaṅgaiḥ sarvān kāmān ubhayataḥ parigṛhyātman dhatte |
GV04sankharu:360: yāvacchastraṃ upasarjanyāṃ saṃkhyāyamānāyām ṛte tūṣṇīṃśaṃsaṃ bṛhatīsahasraṃ saṃpadyate |
GV04sankharu:361: tasya vā etasya bṛhatīsahasrasya ṣaṭtriṃśad akṣarāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi bhavanti |
GV04sankharu:370: bārhato vā eṣa ya eṣa tapati |
GV04sankharu:375: ekāhikī yājyā pratiṣṭhā vā ekāhaḥ pratiṣṭhityā eva |
GV04sankharu:377: sagraham evāyaṃ taṃ prāṅ upāvarohati pratyaṅ preṅkhaphalakam apohati |
GV04sankharu:378: parāmṛśan grahaṃ japati - yam imaṃ prajayaṃ prājaiṣaṃ tam anvasānīti ned asmāt prajayād ātmānam apādadhānīti |
GV04sankharu:381: prajāpatir viśvakarmā tad enaṃ svena rūpeṇa samardhayati |
GV04sankharu:384: tata u ha dīrghatamā daśa puruṣāyuṣāṇi jijīva |
GV04sankharu:385: tad apyetad ṛṣir āha dīrghatamā māmateyo jujurvān daśame yuga iti |
GV04sankharu:386: tad etay āyuṣkāmasya śastram iti ha smāha kauṣītakiḥ |
GV04sankharu:387: tad ya evaṃ vidvān etad ahaḥ śaṃsati sarvam āyur asmiṃl loka eti |
GV04sankharu:396: tad devasya savitur vāryaṃ mahad iti sāvitraṃ mahadvat|
GV04sankharu:398: te hi dyāvāpṛthivī viśvaśaṃbhuva iti dyāvāpṛthivīyam uruvyacaso mahinī asaścateti mahadvat |
GV04sankharu:400: kim u śreṣṭhaḥ kiṃ yaviṣṭho na ājagann ityārbhavam |
GV04sankharu:401: na nindima camasaṃ yo mahākula iti mahadvat |
GV04sankharu:403: asya vāmasya palitasya hotur iti salilaṃ vaiśvadevam |
GV04sankharu:410: bṛhan mahānta urviyā vi rājatheti bṛhadvat |
GV04sankharu:412: baḷa ityā tad vapeṣu dhāyi darśitam iti jātavedasīyaṃ tasya astāvyagniḥ śimīvadbhir arkair ity arkavatyuttamā |
GV04sankharu:419: te 'mṛtatvam āpnuvanti ya etad ahar upayanti ya etad ahar upayanti ||
GV04sankharu:423: citro ha vai gāṅgyāyanir yakṣyamāṇa āruṇiṃ vavre |
GV04sankharu:424: sa ha putraṃ śvetaketuṃ prajighāya yājayeti |
GV04sankharu:426: asti saṃvṛtaṃ loke yasmin mā dhāsyasi,
GV04sankharu:429: sa hovāca - nāham etad veda hantācāryaṃ pṛcchānīti |
GV04sankharu:430: sa ha pitaram āsādya papraccha - itīti māprākṣīt kathaṃ pratibravāṇīti |
GV04sankharu:431: sa hovāca - aham apyetan na veda |
GV04sankharu:432: sadasyeva vayaṃ svādhyāyam adhītya harāmahe yan naḥ pare dadati |
GV04sankharu:434: sa hi samitpāṇiś citraṃ gāṅgyāyaniṃ praticakrama upāyānīti |
GV04sankharu:435: taṃ hovāca - brahmārho 'si gotama yo na mānam upāgāḥ |
GV04sankharu:438: sa hovāca ye vai ke cāsmāl lokāt prayanti candramasam eva te sarvaṃ gacchanti |
GV04sankharu:441: etad vai svargasya lokasya dvāraṃ yac candramāḥ |
GV04sankharu:443: atha yo na pratyāha tam iha vṛṣṭir bhūtvā varṣati |
GV04sankharu:444: sa iha kīṭo vā pataṅgo vā matsyo vā śakunir vā siṃho vā varāho vā paraśvā vā śārdūlo vā puruṣo vānyo vā teṣu teṣu sthaneṣu pratyājāyate yathākarma yathāvidyam |
GV04sankharu:446: taṃ pratibrūyāt - vicakṣaṇād ṛtavo reta ābhṛtaṃ pañcadaśāt prasūtāt pitryāvataḥ |
GV04sankharu:447: tan mā puṃsi kartaryerayadhvaṃ puṃsā kartrā mātari māsiṣiñca ||
GV04sankharu:449: dvādaśatrayodaśena pitrā saṃ tad vide 'haṃ prati tad vide 'haṃ tan ma ṛtavo 'mṛtyava ārambhadhvam ||
GV04sankharu:450: tena satyena tena tapasā ṛtur asmi ārtavo 'smi |
GV04sankharu:453: sa etaṃ devayānaṃ panthānam āpadyāgnilokam āgacchati |
GV04sankharu:474: taṃ brahmāha - abhidhāva ta mama yaśasā |
GV04sankharu:478: taṃ pañca śatānyapsarasāṃ pratiyanti - śataṃ phalahastāḥ,
GV04sankharu:493: tasya priyā jñātayaḥ sukṛtam upayanti, apriyā duṣkṛtam |

GV04sankharu:1082: pratirūpa iti vā aham etam upāsa iti |

GV04sankharu:1085: sa hovāca bālākiḥ - ya evaiṣa cchāyāyāṃ puruṣas tam evāham upāsa iti |
GV04sankharu:1087: dvitīyo 'napaga iti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV04sankharu:1088: sa yo haitam evam upāste vindate dvitīyāt |
GV04sankharu:1091: sa hovāca bālākiḥ - ya evaiṣa pratiśrutkāyāṃ puruṣas tam evāham upāsa iti |
GV04sankharu:1093: asur iti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV04sankharu:1094: sa yo haitam evam upāste na purā kālāt saṃmoham eti ||
GV04sankharu:1096: sa hovāca bālākiḥ - ya evaiṣa śabde puruṣas tam evāham upāsa iti |
GV04sankharu:1098: mṛtyur iti vā aham etam upāsa iti |

GV04sankharu:1101: sa hovāca bālākiḥ - yenaitat puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnayā carati tamu evāham upāsa iti |
GV04sankharu:1103: yamo rājeti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV04sankharu:1104: sa yo haitam evam upāste sarvaṃ hāsmā idaṃ śraiṣṭhyāya yamyate ||
GV04sankharu:1106: sa hovāca bālākiḥ - ya evaiṣa śarīre puruṣas tam evāham upāsa iti |
GV04sankharu:1108: prajāpatir iti vā aham etam upāsa iti |

GV04sankharu:1111: sa hovāca bālākiḥ - ya evaiṣa dakṣiṇe 'kṣiṇi puruṣas tam evāham upāsa iti |
GV04sankharu:1113: vāca ātmāgner ātmā jyotiṣa ātmeti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV04sankharu:1114: sa yo haitam evam upāste eteṣāṃ sarveṣām ātmā bhavati ||
GV04sankharu:1116: sa hovāca bālākiḥ - ya evaiṣa savye 'kṣiṇi puruṣas tam evāham upāsa iti |
GV04sankharu:1118: satyasyātm vidyuta ātmā tejasa ātmeti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV04sankharu:1119: sa yo haitam evam upāste eteṣāṃ sarveṣām ātmā bhavati ||
GV04sankharu:1121: tata u ha bālākis tūṣṇīm āsa |
GV04sankharu:1122: taṃ hovācājātaśatruḥ - etāvān nu bālākā3 iti |
GV04sankharu:1124: taṃ hovācājātaśatruḥ - mṛṣā vai khalu mā saṃvādayiṣṭhā brahma te bravāṇīti |
GV04sankharu:1125: sa hovāca - yo vai bālāka eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ kartā yasya vaitat karma sa vai veditavya iti |
GV04sankharu:1126: tata u ha bālākiḥ samitpāṇiḥ praticakrama upāyānīti |
GV04sankharu:1127: taṃ hovācājātaśatruḥ - pratilomarūpam eva tan manye yat kṣatriyo brāhmaṇam upanayeta |
GV04sankharu:1131: taṃ hājātaśatrur āmantrayāñcakre - bṛhan pāṇḍaravāsaḥ soma rājann iti |
GV04sankharu:1135: taṃ hovācājātaśatruḥ - kvaiṣa etad bālāke puruṣo 'śayiṣṭa, yatraitad abhūt, yata etad āgād iti |
GV04sankharu:1136: hitā nama puruṣasya nāḍyo hṛdayāt purītatam abhipratanvanti tad yathā sahasradhā keśo vipāṭitastvāvad aṇvyaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1137: piṅgalasyāṇimnyas tiṣṭhanti śuklasya kṛṣṇasya pītasya lohitasya ca |
GV04sankharu:1138: tāsu tadā bhavati yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kaṃcana paśyati ||
GV04sankharu:1141: tad enaṃ vāk sarvair nāmabhiḥ sahāpyeti |
GV04sankharu:1146: yathāgner jvalataḥ sarvā diśo visphuliṅgā vipratiṣṭheran evam evaitasmād ātmanaḥ prāṇā yathāyatanaṃ vipratiṣṭhante prāṇebhyo devāḥ devebhyo lokāḥ |
GV04sankharu:1147: sa eṣa prāṇa eva prajñātmedaṃ śarīram AtmAnam anupraviṣṭa ā lomabhya ā nakhebhyaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1148: tad yathā kṣuraḥ kṣuradhāne vopahito viśvaṃbharo vā viśvaṃbarakulāya evam evaiṣa prajñātmedaṃ śarīram ātmānam anupraviṣṭa ā lomabhya ā nakhebhyaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1149: tam etam ātmānam eta ātmāno 'nvavasyante yathā śreṣṭhinaṃ svāḥ |
GV04sankharu:1150: tad yatha śreṣṭhī svair bhuṅkte yathā vā svāḥ śreṣṭhinaṃ bhuñjanti |
GV04sankharu:1152: evam evaita ātmāna etam ātmānaṃ bhuñjanti |
GV04sankharu:1153: sa yāvad dha vā indra etam ātmānaṃ na vijajñe tāvad enam asurā abhibabhūvuḥ |
GV04sankharu:1154: sa yadā vijajñe 'tha hatvāsurān vijitya sarveṣāṃ ca devānāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ svārājyam ādhipatyaṃ paryait |
GV04sankharu:1155: tathau evaivaṃ vidvān sarvān pāpmano 'pahaty sarveṣāṃ ca bhūtānām śraiṣṭhyaṃ svārājya ādhipatyaṃ paryeti |
GV04sankharu:1156: ya evaṃ veda ya evaṃ veda ||
GV04sankharu:1162: tan mām avatu tad vaktāram avatvavatu mām avatu vaktāram |
GV04sankharu:1172: śivā naḥ śaṭamā bhava sumṛḍīkā sarasvati mā te vyoma saṃdṛśi |
GV04sankharu:1173: adabdhaṃ mana iṣiraṃ cakṣuḥ sūryo jyotiṣāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1177: pṛthivī pūrvarūpaṃ dyaur uttararūpaṃ vāyuḥ saṃhiteti śauravīro māṇḍūkeyaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1178: ākāśaḥ saṃhitetyasya māṇḍavyo vedayāñ cakre - sa hāviparihṛto mene na me 'sya putreṇa samagād iti |
GV04sankharu:1180: samānaṃ hyatra pituśca putrasya ca vāyuś cākāśaś ca |
GV04sankharu:1183: vāk pūrvarūpaṃ mana uttararūpaṃ prāṇaḥ saṃhiteti śauravīro māṇḍūkeyaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1184: atha ha smāsya putra āha dīrghaḥ - manasā vā agre kīrtayati tad vācā vadati |
GV04sankharu:1185: tasmān mana eva pūrvarūpaṃ vāg uttararūpaṃ mano vāk prāṇas tveva saṃhiteti |
GV04sankharu:1186: sa eṣo 'śvarathaḥ praṣṭivāhano manovākprāṇasaṃhitaḥ svargaṃ lokaṃ gamayati |
GV04sankharu:1187: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur etīti nu māṇḍūkeyānām ||
GV04sankharu:1190: sa yadi nirbhujaḥ khalu vai vayaṃ madhyamo vāk prāṇena mātā jāyā prajñā vāg bṛhadgatirvālisarvamuttamam ||
GV04sankharu:1193: pṛthivī pūrvarūpaṃ dyaur uttararūpaṃ vāyuḥ saṃhitā vṛṣṭiḥ saṃdhiḥ saṃdhātā |
GV04sankharu:1194: tad utāpi yatraitad balavad anugṛhṇan mahāmegho vṛṣṭiṃ varṣati |
GV04sankharu:1201: yathāsau dyāvāpṛthivyor antareṇākāśa etasminn ākāśe prāṇa āyatto bhavati yathāmuṣminn ākāśe vāyur āyatto bhavati |
GV04sankharu:1202: yathāmūni trīṇi jyotīṃṣyevam imāni puruṣe trīṇi jyotīṃṣi |
GV04sankharu:1203: yathāsau divyāditya evam idaṃ śirasi cakṣuḥ |
GV04sankharu:1204: yathāsāvantarikṣe vidyud evam idam ātmani hṛdayam |
GV04sankharu:1205: yathāyam agniḥ pṛthivyam evam idam upasthe retaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1206: evamiva ha sma sarvata ātmānam anuvidhāyāha - idam eva pūrvarūpam idam uttararūpaṃ mano vāk prāṇas tveva saṃhiteti |

GV04sankharu:1208: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ +veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena
GV04sankharu:1211: pṛthivī pūrvarūpaṃ dyaur uttararūpaṃ vāyuḥ saṃhitā diśaḥ saṃdhir ādityaḥ saṃdhāteti vaiśvāmitraḥ |
GV04sankharu:1214: vāk pūrvarūpaṃ mana uttararūpaṃ prāṇaḥ saṃhitā śrotraṃ saṃdhiś cakṣuḥ saṃdhātā |
GV04sankharu:1215: sa ya evam etāṃ etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti ||
GV04sankharu:1217: agniḥ pūrvarūpaṃ candramā uttararūpaṃ vidyut saṃhiteti sūryadattaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1219: athādhyātmam - vāk pūrvarūpaṃ mana uttararūpaṃ satyaṃ saṃhitā |
GV04sankharu:1220: sa ya evam etāṃ etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti ||
GV04sankharu:1222: pṛthivī pūrvarūpaṃ dyaur uttararūpaṃ kālaḥ saṃhiteti rādheyaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1224: athādhyātmam - vāk pūrvarūpaṃ mana uttararūpaṃ ātmā saṃhitā |
GV04sankharu:1225: sa ya evam etāṃ etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti ||
GV04sankharu:1227: vāk pūrvarūpaṃ mana uttararūpaṃ vidyā saṃhiteti pauṣkarasādiḥ |
GV04sankharu:1228: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti ||
GV04sankharu:1232: sa ya enaṃ prāṇaṃ vaṃśaṃ bruvan param upavadet śaknuvan kaścic cen manyeta - prāṇaṃ vaṃśaṃ +samadhām |
GV04sankharu:1235: atha ced aśaknuvan manyeta prāṇaṃ vaṃśaṃ samadhitsīḥ taṃ nāśakaḥ saṃdhātuṃ prāṇas tvā vaṃśo hāsyatītyevainaṃ brūyāt |
GV04sankharu:1236: yathā nu kathā ca bruvan vābruvan vā brūyād abhyāśam eva yat tat tathā syāt |
GV04sankharu:1237: na tvevānyat kuśalād brāhmaṇaṃ brūyād atidyumna eva brāhmaṇaṃ brūyān nātidyumne ca na brāhmaṇaṃ brūyān namo 'stu brāhmaṇebhya iti śauravīro māṇḍūkeyaḥ ||
GV04sankharu:1239: sa yadi prāṇaṃ vaṃśaṃ bruvantaṃ param upavadet śaknuvantaṃ cen manyeta - prāṇaṃ vaṃśaṃ samadhitsiṣam prāṇaṃ vaṃśaṃ saṃdhitsituṃ na śaknoṣītyāttha |
GV04sankharu:1241: atha ced aśaknuvantaṃ manyeta - prāṇaṃ vaṃśaṃ samadhitsīs tan nāśakaḥ saṃdhātum |
GV04sankharu:1243: yathā nu kathā ca bruvantaṃ vābruvantaṃ vā brūyād abhyāśam eva yat tat tathā syāt |
GV04sankharu:1244: na tvevānyat kuśalād brāhmaṇaṃ brūyād atidyumna eva brāhmaṇaṃ brūyān nātidyumne ca na brāhmaṇaṃ brūyān namo 'stu brāhmaṇebhya iti śauravīro māṇḍūkeyaḥ ||
GV04sankharu:1247: pṛthivyāyatanaṃ nirbhujaṃ divāyatanaṃ pratṛṇṇam antartikṣāyatanam ubhayam antareṇa |
GV04sankharu:1248: sa ya enaṃ nirbhujaṃ bruvan param upavadet |
GV04sankharu:1249: pṛthivīṃ devatām āraḥ pṛthivī tvā devatāriṣyatītyenaṃ brūyāt |
GV04sankharu:1250: atha yadi pratṛṇṇam bruvan param upavaded divaṃ devatām āro dyaus tvā devatāriṣyatītyenaṃ brūyāt |
GV04sankharu:1251: atha yadyubhayam antareṇa bruvan param upavaded antarikṣaṃ devatām āra antarikṣaṃ tvā devatāriṣyatītiyenaṃ brūyāt |
GV04sankharu:1252: yad dhi saṃdhiṃ vivartayati tan nirbhujasya rūpam |
GV04sankharu:1253: atha yac chuddhe akṣare abhivyāharati tat pratṛṇṇasyāgra u eva |
GV04sankharu:1255: annādyakāmo nirbhujaṃ brūyāt svargakāṃaḥ pratṛṇṇam ubhayakāma ubhayamantareṇa |
GV04sankharu:1256: sa ya enaṃ nirbhujaṃ bruvan param upavaded acyoṣṭhā avarābhyāṃ sthānābhyām ityenaṃ brūyāt |
GV04sankharu:1257: atha yadi pratṛṇṇam bruvan param upavaded acyoṣṭhā uttarābhyāṃ sthānābhyām ityevainaṃ brūyāt |
GV04sankharu:1259: yathā nu kathā ca bruvan vābruvan vā brūyād abhyāśam kuśalād brāhmaṇaṃ brūyād atidyumna evaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brūyān nātidyumne ca na brāhmaṇaṃ brūyāt |
GV04sankharu:1265: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti ||
GV04sankharu:1267: atha vai vayaṃ brūmo nirbhujavaktrāḥ sma iti ha smāha hvastro māṇḍūkeyaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1269: tad yāsau mātrā pūrvarūpottarūpe antareṇa yena saṃdhiṃ vivartayati yena mātrāmātraṃ vibhajati yena svarāt svaraṃ vijñāpayati sā saṃhiteti |
GV04sankharu:1270: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti ||
GV04sankharu:1272: atha ha smāsya putra āha madhyamaḥ prātiyodhīputro magadhavāsī pūrvam evākṣaraṃ pūrvarūpam uttaram uttararūpam |
GV04sankharu:1273: tad yāsau mātrā saṃdhivijñāpanī sāma tad bhavati sāmaihāvaṃ saṃhitāṃ manya iti |
GV04sankharu:1274: tad etad ṛcābhyuditam - mā naḥ stenebhyo ye abhi druhas pade nirāmiṇo ripavo 'nneṣu jāgṛdhuḥ |
GV04sankharu:1275: ā devānām ohate vi vrayo hṛdi bṛhaspate na paraḥ sāmno viduḥ ||
GV04sankharu:1277: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti ||
GV04sankharu:1280: prāṇaḥ pavamānena pavamāno viśvair devair viśve devāḥ svargeṇa lokena svargo loko brahmaṇā saiṣāvaraparā saṃhitā |
GV04sankharu:1281: sa ya evam etām avaraparāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda evaṃ haiva sa prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena saṃdhīyate yathaiṣāvaraparā saṃhitā |
GV04sankharu:1282: sa yadi pareṇa vopasṛṣṭaḥ svena vārthenābhivyāhared abhivyāharann eva vidyāt - divaṃ saṃhitāgamad viduṣo devān abhivyāhārārtham evaṃ bhaviṣyatīti |
GV04sankharu:1285: mātā pūrvarūpaṃ pitottararūpaṃ prajā saṃhiteti bhārgavaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1286: tad etad ekam eva sarvaṃ abhyanūktam |
GV04sankharu:1287: mātā ca hyevedaṃ pitā ca prajā ca sarvam |
GV04sankharu:1289: aditir hevedaṃ sarvaṃ yad idaṃ kiṃcid viśvabhūtam |
GV04sankharu:1290: tad etad ṛcābhyuditam - aditir dyaur aditir antarikṣaṃ aditir mātā sā pitā sa putraḥ |
GV04sankharu:1291: viśve devā aditiḥ pañca janā aditir jātam aditir janitvam ||
GV04sankharu:1292: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti ||

GV04sankharu:1790_1: parisamuhya paristīrya paryukṣya dakṣiṇaṃ jānv ācyottarato 'gneḥ kaṃse maṇiṃ kṛtvā
GV04sankharu:1791: hastivarcasam ity etābhiḥ pratyṛcam aṣṭābhiḥ saptarātraṃ madhusarpiṣor vāsayitvā trirātram ekāṃ vā badhnīyād ghṛtād ullupta ity etayarcā |
GV04sankharu:1792: ata evottaraṃ ṣaḍbhir hṛdayaśūlāgramaṇiṃ pratodāgramaṇiṃ vā muśalāgramaṇiṃ vā khadirasāramaṇiṃ vā māṃsaudane vāsayitvā trirātram ekāṃ vā badhnīyāt |
GV04sankharu:1793: ata evottaraṃ catasṛbhir vṛṣabhaśṛṅgāgramaṇiṃ ghṛtaudane vāsayitvā trirātram ekāṃ vā badhnīyāt |
GV04sankharu:1794: ata evottaraṃ ekayairaṇḍamaṇiṃ tilaudane vāsayitvā trirātram ekāṃ vā badhnīyāt |
GV04sankharu:1795: ata evottaraṃ ṣoḷaśabhir bailvaṃ saptarātraṃ madhusarpiṣor vāsayitvā trirātram ekāṃ vā badhnīyād ghṛtād ullupta ity etayarcā |

GV04sankharu:1796_1: chaktau sati prathamaṃ hastichāyāyāṃ vaiyāghre vāpi carmaṇy āsīno vāpi juhuyād āsīno vāpi juhuyāt ||
GV04sankharu:1802: tad u ha vātmā draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavya iti |
GV04sankharu:1803: tam etaṃ vedānuvacanena vividiṣanti brahmacaryeṇa tapasā śraddhayā yajñenānāśakena ceti māṇḍūkeyaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1804: tasmād evaṃvic chānto dānta uparatas titikṣuḥ śraddhāvitto bhūtvātmany evātmānaṃ paśyed iti māṇḍavyaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1805: yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ puruṣaḥ prāṇeṣu sa eṣa neti nety ātmā na gṛhya idaṃ brahmedaṃ kṣatram ime devā ime vedā ime lokā imāni sarvāṇi bhūtānīdaṃ sarvaṃ yad ayam ātmā |
GV04sankharu:1806: sa eṣa tat tvam asīty ātmāvagamyo 'haṃ brahmāsmīti |
GV04sankharu:1807: tad etad brahmāpūrvam aparam anaparam anantaram abāhyam ayam ātmā brahma sarvānubhūr ity anuśāsanam iti yājñavalkyaḥ |
GV04sankharu:1808: tad etan nāputrāya nānantevāsine vā brūyād iti |
GV04sankharu:1809: ya imām adbhiḥ parigṛhītāṃ vasumatīṃ dhanasya pūrṇāṃ dadyād idam eva tato bhūya idam eva tato bhūya ity anuśāsanam |
GV04sankharu:1810: tām etām upaniṣadaṃ vedaśiro na yathā kathaṃ cana vadet |
